    5

    de5 • de

    Meaning

    Primary

    possess

    Alternatives

    possession, of, possessive, possessive particle, possessed, possesses

    Hint

    This is a very common character that has a variety of grammatical purposes in Chinese. In HanziHero, we will only focus on it's possessive-forming aspect. In this sense, it is similar to "'s" added to the end of a noun in English.

    Mnemonic

    [d-] Dracula is on the [5] roof of the [-e] electricity plant with a bunch of 勺 ladles that he 的 possesses. As he slowly burns alive and turns 白 white, he uses an electric device to write his name in 白 white on each of the 勺 ladles, so everyone knows that he once 的 possessed them, even after he burns to death.

    Similar Meaning Characters

    • yǒu 有 possess

    Found In Words
